mapper.select: select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, views, reg_date, edit_date from notice where notice_id=#{notice_id}
select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, views, cast(reg_date as date) as reg_date, edit_date from notice where notice_id=#{notice_id}

select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, views, cast(reg_date as date) as reg_date, edit_date from notice where notice_id = (select notice_id from notice where notice_id > #{notice_id} order by notice_id limit 0,1)

select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, views, cast(reg_date as date) as reg_date, edit_date from notice where notice_id = (select notice_id from notice where notice_id < #{notice_id} order by notice_id desc limit 0,1)

select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, views, reg_date, edit_date from notice
notice_title like concat('%', #{notice_title}, '%')
or notice_content like concat('%', #{notice_content}, '%')
order by notice_id desc
limit #{offset}, #{listCount}

select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, views, cast(reg_date as date) as reg_date, edit_date from notice
notice_title like concat('%', #{notice_title}, '%')
or notice_content like concat('%', #{notice_content}, '%')
order by notice_id desc
limit #{offset}, #{listCount}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_title, notice_content, views, reg_date, edit_date) values (#{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, 0, now(), now());
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content}, edit_date = now() where notice_id=#{notice_id};
